item.description:
2012 New England Longboard Classic

Sunday, June 10, 2012 at 10 am, Nantasket Beach – Hull, Mass. Contest Entry Fee – $25 before June 10th ; $40 thereafter Party Only Entry Fee at The Red Parrot–$15 before June 10th; $20 thereafter DON’T MISS THIS!

Contest limited to first 125 entrants. Price includes:
 Contest admission
 Paddleboard race (if no waves)
 New England Longboard Classic tee shirt to first 75 entrants
 Sunset Party including a great buffet at The Red Parrot Restaurant
 Awards and over $1,000 in prizes
 Silent Auction – proceeds to benefit Save the Children
 Live band

This will be a low-key, non-ego-motivated gathering of old friends and new, riding longboards (in whatever waves are breaking that day) for good fun!

No finals, no pressure—just stoke!
Make check payable to: Chick Frodigh, 60 Mountain Av., Pembroke, MA 02359 (781-294-8941)

Check out their new website: www.nesurfmuseum.com

DOWNLOAD THE ENTRY FORM

(in the past this contest has met at the north bathhouse - the red one on the north side of the beach)

Arrive early to get a good parking spot!
item.name: New England Longboard Classic
